About Me

I am a self-motivated learner, combining technical skills with creativity to bring ideas to life. With a solid foundation in computer science and practical experience in app and web development, I continuously strive to refine my skills and take on exciting challenges.

My areas of interest include data science, cybersecurity, and artificial intelligence, with a growing focus on cutting-edge technologies like IoT and cloud computing.
